full_summary:
**Tender Details** # PW-_MCT-045-6256
====================================================

**Title** | English    | French
----------|-----------|----------
Lockers    | CFIA Lockers | Casiers ACIA
**Reference Number** | PW-_MCT-045-6256
**Amendment Number** | 0
**Solicitation Number** | EB129-230700/A
**Publication Date** | 2022-09-13
**Tender Closing Date** | 2022-09-29T13:00:00

### Description
Trade Agreement: Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). ONLY those businesses that qualify as Indigenous are eligible to submit bids.
### Tender Status
Expired
### Goods and Services
* Cabinets, Lockers, Bins and Shelving

### Regions of Opportunity
* Newfoundland and Labrador
### Regions of Delivery
* Newfoundland and Labrador
### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering
### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Important Instructions
Suppliers are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service or facsimile instead of any other method. If a hand delivery is required, please use the on-site bid drop box.
